In honor of Jack Wilson who saved countless lives in Texas, I have introduced the Jack Wilson Act in the State of Virginia. 

With the Jack Wilson Act, citizens will be able to carry a firearm in churches. 

A good guy with a gun, is how you stop a bad guy with a gun.

A kì í gbọ́ kúkù òjò da omi agbada nù. /
Never pour away the water (you have) in the trough, simply because you heard the rumbling of the cloud. 
[Don't be presumptuous; never jump the gun; it's never wise to count one's chickens before they are hatched.]
